name: AJAX Slide
author: Julian Widya Perdana

sections.description:
Gives sliding animation on your page whenever you are going to go to another link using AJAX.

It works just like Page Slide animation on Microsoft Power Point. So you will see fading animations before you were redirected to desired URL.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zipped file to yoursite/wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Gives sliding animation on your page whenever you are going to go to another link using AJAX.
